traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The rakklethorn toad has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Thorn Volley
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 50 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 hour.
